Critical accounting estimates and judgements

Estimates and judgements are continually evaluated by management and are based on historical experience and other factors, including expectations of future events that may have a financial impact on the Group and that are believed to be reasonable under the circumstances The estimates and assumptions that have a significant risk of causing a material adjustment to the carrying amounts of assets and liabilities are found in the following notes:

- Income taxes Note B7

- Fair value of derivatives and other financial instruments Note B15 - Estimated impairment of intangible assets and cash generating units Note B16 - Provision for maintenance expenditure Note B17 - Valuation of promissory notes and concession notes Note B18
